description: System-generated unique identifier for this subreport configuration record used as the primary key.
Language code for rendering the subreport; likely ISO language abbreviation; confirm with SME.
Identifier of the parent report type this configuration applies to; used to group related subreports.
Logical placement identifier indicating where this subreport appears within the parent report layout.
Filename of the report template used to render the subreport within the reporting engine.
Name of the database view or dataset supplying data to the subreport.
Field in the parent dataset used to join to the subreport’s dataset for contextual filtering.
Field in the subreport’s dataset that joins back to the parent dataset.
Embedded XML definition of the subreport’s design and formatting used by the report renderer.
Flag indicating the subreport should be suppressed when its dataset returns no rows.
User identifier that created this configuration record, for audit tracking.
Timestamp when this configuration record was created.
User identifier that last updated this configuration record.
Timestamp of the most recent update to this configuration record.
